name: Keqing
storytext: She can build decks heretofore not conceived and win battles in which victory is unthinkable.
source: Reward for inviting Keqing to a duel at The Cat's Tail and claiming victory in a Friendly Fracas with her

skills.name: Stellar Restoration
skills.description: Deals 3 Electro DMG, creates 1 Lightning Stiletto.
